code.text: Pediatric-onset adult sarcoidosis with liver, splenic, and abdominal lymphadenopathy and mild pulmonary fibrosis

resource.valueString: Microcytic iron deficiency anemia, Chest X-ray was negative

resource.description: MRI examination of the superior and inferior abdomen with contrast medium confirmed increased liver dimensions and its structural inhomogeneity with zones of signal alteration.

code.text: Liver and lymph node ultrasound-guided biopsy

outcome.text: Non-necrotizing granulomatous inflammation, resembling sarcoidosis, and aspects of non-specific inflammation of the liver.

resource.description: Brain MRI to rule out cerebral involvement; revealed normal findings.

code.text: Periodic follow-up visits consisting of clinical and laboratory evaluation every 6 months and annual pulmonary function tests.

detail.description: Patient will be advised to notify healthcare provider of any new symptoms or worsening of current symptoms.
